text: You escaped the cellar, but the Silk Masks are hunting you. You need to break into their safehouse, steal the ledger containing your debt, and burn it.
A hooded merchant gestures to his wares. "Quickly now. The guards are patrolling."
You hand over the coin and pocket the explosive.
You crouch in the alley outside the safehouse. A burly thug guards the front door, unaware of your presence.
The bomb detonates! You slip past the coughing guard and lose the bomb in the process.
The guard falls. You quickly drag his body into the shadows and find a Silk Mask cloak.
Inside, the air is thick with cigar smoke. To the left is the Armory. Straight ahead is the Boss's Office.
The armory is unguarded. You find a wicked-looking blade resting on a velvet cushion.
The heavy oak door to the office is locked. You can hear heavy breathing on the other side.
"Yeah? Come in," a gruff voice yells. You step inside, your face hidden by the cloak. Garrick looks up from the ledger.
The lock clicks. You push the door open to find Garrick, the Enforcer, staring right at you.
Your lockpick snaps loudly! The door rips open, and Garrick backhands you across the room.
Garrick cracks his knuckles. "Nobody leaves the Silk Masks alive."
Garrick is dead. You grab the ledger from his desk and toss it into the fireplace. The debt is erased. You are truly free.
Your vision fades to black. The Silk Masks always collect their dues.
